DOC.brief_summary: The study is designed to evaluate elements of cognitive function in subjects receiving either fesoterodine or alprazolam.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Cognitive Effects of Fesoterodine in Elderly Subjects
DOC.criteria: Adult healthy volunteers 65 years and over with minimum MMSE of 26 Prohibited concomitant medications Confounding medical conditions Clinically significant comorbid diseases Hypersensitivity or contraindications to fesoterodine or active control
